scripts.copy-json-schema: mkdir -p dist/tools && find src/tools -type d -name 'schema-json' -exec sh -c 'mkdir -p dist/tools/$(dirname {} | sed "s/src\/tools\///") && cp -r {} dist/tools/$(dirname {} | sed "s/src\/tools\///")/' \;
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm install --save-dev @wegotdocs/shared@latest && npm run copy-json-schema
